articles.title: Margate Winter Gardens: Questions linger over future of iconic venue - BBC
articles.description: The Beatles, Laurel and Hardy and Blossoms have all performed at the Winter Gardens in Margate.
articles.content:
By Stuart MaisnerBBC News
Questions linger over the future of an iconic venue which has helped bring prime ministers, the Beatles and Laurel and Hardy to the Kent coast.
Carved into a cliffside in … [+5684 chars]
